SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_1_1: taṃ satpathajñaṃ praṇipatya buddhaṃ śāstraṃ kariṣyāmyabhidharmadīpam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_14_0: kliṣṭameva hi vijñānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ janmani śrayāt /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_15_0: nabhaḥ khalu nabho dhātorāsanno hetureṣa tu /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_26_1: na śubhaṃ nāpi ca kliṣṭaṃ dvitīyādiṣu darśakam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_36_0: spṛśyaṃ dvidhā sadharmāṃśāḥ saha tā nava bhautikāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_36_1: daśa sāvayavā mūrtāḥ ta eva daśa saṃcitāḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_48_0: na hyūrdhvaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāyo na rūpaṃ nākṣijaṃ manaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_48_1: vijñānasya tu netrārthastau ca kāyasya savaṃtaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_49_0: nopariṣṭācchru teḥ kāyo na śabdo na svakaṃ manaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_49_1: vijñānasya tu nihrādastau ca kāyasya sarvataḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_63_1: tadā saṃyojanaṃ tvāryaḥ paryādatte na kiñcana //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_65_0: na tu saṃyojanaṃ kiñcitparyādatte tadā hyasau /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_69_1: ābhāsvarācca vairāgyaṃ yāti hanti tu nāsravān //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_70_1: śubhakṛtsnācca vairāgyaṃ yāti kleśānna hanti tu //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_71_0: dvivijñeyāḥ guṇāḥ pañca hetuḥ sarve kṣarākṣarāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_73_0: nāmnā dvāviṃśatistāni dravyato daśa sapta ca /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_82_0: śraddhādīnāṃ vidāṃ caiva doṣaḥ śuddhau malodaye /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_86_0: kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_86_1: sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_87_0: kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_87_1: sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_89_1: navābhyāsapraheyāṇi dvidhā pañca na tu trayam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_90_0: pūrvaṃ kramodbhavaiḥ kāme vipāko labhyate dvayam /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_90_1: anyaiḥ ṣaṭ sapta vāṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpe antye tu jīvitam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_91_1: daśāṣṭau nava catvāri kāme pañca śubhāni vā //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_103_0: samyaktvaniyatā ye tu ye ca śraddhādhimuktikāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_111_1: cittaṃ caitasikaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ tu svalakṣaṇaiḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_114_1: kliṣṭe ṣaṭ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyamanapatrapā //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_131_1: ādilābhe saha prākca tadūrdhvaṃ vā tridheṣyate //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_132_0: kliṣṭāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ ca tadanyeṣāṃ tridhā matā /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_147_0: na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_149_1: tathaiva ca vipākaśca sābhāgyaṃ prāptayo dvidhā //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_155_0: kāyikaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caiva cetanākhyaṃ ca mānasam /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_163_1: etānyo yāti śaraṇaṃ sa yāti śaraṇatrayam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_170_1: bhūsaṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyānajaṃ śubham //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_181_1: satkṣetre kriyate yacca phalaṃ tasya niyamyate //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_187_0: navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇākṛṣṇayāghātinī /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_190_1: śubhāḥ sapta dvidhā jñeyā ekadhaite samāhitāḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_194_1: prāṇinaścātha bhogāśca nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_207_1: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_208_0: śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_208_1: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_211_0: ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_211_1: dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dṛggheyasya tu karmaṇaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_212_0: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_212_1: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_215_1: kartṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_227_1: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_229_1: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_268_0: bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_269_0: ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_279_0: dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_291_1: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_300_0: ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmasau /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_313_1: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_320_0: ko vighnaḥ aṅgavaikalyam na tatsarvāstitā sadā /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_320_1: tatkathaṃ śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_323_1: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_333_0: catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_336_1: rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_347_0: duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_353_1: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyorddhvaṃ pañca pañca vā //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_354_1: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_360_0: vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_362_0: sāvidyā dve upādāne yathāktau dve tu dṛṅmaye /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_366_0: ādyantye dve dṛśau kāṅkṣākāmacchando dvireva yaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_381_1: dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_414_1: saṃmukhe nāma jātāstu tisra eva vinirdiśet //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_416_0: āryasya khalu vairāgyaprayoge kṣepaṇe pi ca /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_427_0: punastridhā tridhā kṛtvā trīnato rūpagā nava /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_464_1: buddho yastadguṇe śraddhā prasādaḥ sa jine mataḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_468_0: pūrvoktaiva hi yā bodhiḥ sā samyagjñānamucyate /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_470_1: ākhyātā dhātavaḥ sūtre tridhā bhedo hyapekṣayā //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_475_1: caturthī pañcamī ṣaṣṭhī vidyāt saptasu bhūmiṣu //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_491_0: mārgākhye tvanvayajñāne ṣaḍ bhāvyante 'tha sapta vā /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_501_1: aṣṭākāraṃ dvitīyaṃ tu navajñānamayaṃ tu yat //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_505_0: sandhau sandhau ca buddhasya kāyenārāyaṇaṃ balam /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_521_0: divyamavyākṛtaṃ śrotraṃ netraṃ cānyā śubhā matāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_523_1: harato dve kuśāstṛbhyo mārebhyo harate param //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_526_1: rūpasparśau matau rūpe sveśarīre 'tha vā bahiḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_528_0: tallābho dhyānavat jñeyaḥ śuddhakācca svataśca tat /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_529_1: ekasya bruvataḥ sarve nirmitā bruvate samam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_537_0: bhedena tu samāpattidravyāṇi daśa sapta ca /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_539_1: tathaiva traya ārūpyā bhavāgraṃ tu dvidhā matam //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_540_0: sāmantāni dvidhā sapta prathamaṃ tu tridhā matam /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_544_0: tṛtīye pañcame prajñā smṛtyupekṣā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_545_0: antye catvāryupekṣe dve samādhiḥ smṛtireva ca /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_545_1: kliṣṭe dhyāne caturthe tu dve aṅge vedanā sthitiḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_546_0: dravyātmanā daśaikaṃ ca nāmnā tvaṣṭau daśaiva ca /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_556_0: dhyātā proktastathā dhyeyaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ tathā /
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_565_1: dve trīṇi trīṇi ca dve vā hānapakṣyādyanantaram //
SA01vabhdiku:abhidh-d_567_1: śuddhakācca tṛtīyaṃ svaṃ niṣṭhā śuddhācca nirmalam //
